content:
At the HL7 IG workshop, I was shown how to create -intro and -notes files that would get included into a StructureDefinition output html file as part of the build process. I tried doing that recently and it doesn't appear to work.
i.e. I have a resource
resources/StructureDefinition-BreastBodyLocation.json
and I create files
pages/StructureDefinition-BreastBodyLocation-notes.md
pages/StructureDefinition-BreastBodyLocation-intro.md

and I don't see the text of either file in the output StructureDefinition-BreastBodyLocation.html file.
Has this capability been removed from the publisher?
(I don't want to spend a couple days figuring trying to see what I am doing wrong if it just isn't supported any more)
Thanks!
Thank's. Probably operator error. Will start digging...
It hasn't been deliberately removed, but it's currently not working (been in that state for at least a month). I will try to find time to dig today or tomorrow to figure out why and fix.
